House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04787
FULL TITLE : AN ACT FURTHER AMENDING COMMONWEALTH ACT NO. 146 OR THE PUBLIC SERVICE ACT, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Provides for the transfer of powers and duties of the Public Service Commission to the various administrative agencies of the government according to their respective jurisdictions; States that "Public Utility" shall refer to a public service that regularly supplies the public and directly transmits and distributes to the public through a network its commodity or service of public consequence a public utility necessary to the public and a natural monopoly that needs to be regulated when the public interest so requires as determined by Congress; Enumerates and provides for exemptions operations which shall be classified as public utility.
